description: Desktop companion app interface specification for NGKs ExecLedger

sessionRoot.description: Absolute path to the artifacts session root directory

summaryFile.description: Absolute path to summary.txt file containing gate results

reportFile.description: Absolute path to report.txt file containing human-readable artifacts report

artifactsFolder.description: Absolute path to session directory containing all artifacts artifacts

hashes.description: Optional SHA256 hashes of key files for integrity verification

getLatestSession.description: Retrieve information about the most recent artifacts session

getAllSessions.description: Retrieve information about all available artifacts sessions

bundlePointer.description: JSON file containing pointers to latest artifacts bundle artifacts

integrityData.description: Optional JSON file containing integrity hashes for verification
